item.name: Pulse
item.description: IIS Site Checker should be sending a periodical pulse. If a pulse is not received during some period of time, that means a network issue exists or the checker service is down. The rest of triggers don't make sense in that case, so they are dependent on pulse.

trigger_prototype.name: IIS Site {#SITE_NAME} http probe was not successfull
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger expects "STATUS_OK" as success. Errors are self-explanatory.

trigger_prototype.name: No probe data on IIS Site {#SITE_NAME} for 16 minutes

dependency.name: No pulse from IIS Site checker for 15 minutes

trigger_prototype.name: No state data on IIS Site {#SITE_NAME} for 16 minutes

dependency.name: No pulse from IIS Site checker for 15 minutes

template.template: Template Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server - Custom Items
template.name: Template Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server - Custom Items

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Caching Memory
item.description: The total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for caching.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Database Node Memory
item.description: The total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for database nodes.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Record Flow Memory
item.description: The total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for record flow.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Recursive Query Failure
item.description: The total number of recursive query failures.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Secure Update Failure
item.description: The total number of secure updates failed on the DNS server.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server TCP Message Memory
item.description: The total TCP message memory used by the DNS server.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Total Query Received
item.description: The total number of queries received by the DNS server.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Total Query Received/sec
item.description: The total number of queries received by the DNS server in each second.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server UDP Message Memory
item.description: The total UDP message memory used by the DNS server.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Zone Transfer Failure
item.description: The total number of failed zone transfers of the master DNS server.

item.name: Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server Zone Transfer Success
item.description: The total number of successful zone transfers of the master DNS server.

trigger.expression: {Template Windows 2008 R2 DNS Server - Custom Items:service_state[DNS].last(,0)}<>0
trigger.name: DNS Service
No data from Redis during 5 minutes
No data on ESXi storage for 1 hour
No pulse from IIS Site checker for 15 minutes
trigger.description: The IIS host may be down or the IIS Checker service may be not running or the network may be not reachable.

trigger.name: Redis memory is approaching its limit
